participant_1.background:
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
i go to a private high school.
I am not a big sports fan, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

participant_2.background:
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.
i live on a ranch.
i m too short to reach the top shelf.
i am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines.
i aspire to paint murals.

content.text: I'm doing alright, how about you?
Not so good, actually. I just had a bit of a falling out with my father.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. What happened?
Well, I told him I wanted to be a chef, and he said it was a stupid idea. He said that I'm not cut out for it.
That's not true! You're a great cook, and you're always so passionate about it.
Thanks, I appreciate that. But I don't know what to do. I don't want to disappoint him, but I also don't want to give up on my dream.
Well, I think you should follow your dream. If you're passionate about it, you'll be good at it. And if you're good at it, you'll be successful.
I don't know, I'm scared. I'm scared of failing.
Everyone's scared of failing. But that doesn't mean you shouldn't try.
You're right. I'll talk to him again. Maybe I can convince him.
I hope so. And if not, you always have me to support you.
